sentences.sentence: When they had got on some way they came to four crossways, each leading to a different country.
sentences.translation: 他们走了不远，来到十字路口，四个方向里每一个都通向一个不同的国家。

sentences.sentence: At every crossways on the road that leads to the future, each progressive spirit is opposed by thousands of men appointed to guard the past.
sentences.translation: 在通往未来道路的每一个十字路口上，每一个具有进步思想的人都会遭到受命维护过去的千千万万名卫道士的反对。

sentences.sentence: Yes, my very dear Virginia, I was at a crossways just about the time I first met you.
sentences.translation: 是的，我最亲爱的维吉尼亚，我就站在第一次遇见你的的十字街头。
